headline: Jefferies Reiterates a Buy Rating on Boston Scientific Corporation (BSX), Sets a $130 PT
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE:BSX) is one of the best stocks to invest in for beginners. In a report released on August 11, Matthew Taylor from Jefferies reiterated a Buy rating on Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE:BSX) with a price target of $130.00. The rating update followed the company’s release of fiscal Q2 2025 earnings on July […]
